item.title: Onion prices jump to Tk 150 per kg in two days
item.description: Onion prices have surged by Tk 40–50 per kg within just two days, with the kitchen markets in Dhaka now selling it at Tk 140–150 per kg. A visit to several city markets on Saturday found wholesalers charging Tk 650–680 for a palla (5 kg), pushing retail prices up sharply.
